channel.title: Think your smart ~ read this
channel.description: hi peeps,well here is the problem i have a client (my own ! not leeched) and i need to run it (ovo ) to play is but every time i hit "run with GUI" it just flashes here is what is inside it [code]@ECHO OFF color 77 title server name here echo Running elementalscape JAVA -Xmx500m client [/code] what is the correct code for my [size=7][COLOR=RED]CLIENT[/COLOR][/size] RUN

item.title: Think your smart ~ read this
item.dc:creator: @sticky_wicky sticky wicky
item.description:
@sticky_wicky wrote:

tonypker13:

Yea, even if it’s on the run. If you edit your compiler to fit your Java, your Run will work.

tonypker13 this is what is in my compile @echo off color 0a title elemental c0mp1lEr echo YOU CAN LEECH MY STUFF if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo THE CLIENT SUCCESSFULY COMPILED 'HAPPY CHRISTMAS' pausE exit

Read full topic

item.title: Think your smart ~ read this

item.description:
@sticky_wicky wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:7, topic:246260”]Instead of running EGUI, Try Gui.

@ECHO OFF TITLE elementalscape color 77 cd files JAVA -Xmx500m Gui PAUSE [/quote]
ok will do[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2008, 02:17:15 pm[/size][hr]tony pker thanks for that it made it stay instead of flashing but now its says java is not reconsed as an internal or external coammnd

item.title: Think your smart ~ read this
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Instead of running EGUI, Try Gui.

@ECHO OFF
TITLE elementalscape
color 77
cd files
JAVA -Xmx500m Gui
PAUSE
